elements.label: Howe, an acquaintance
elements.description: There is something... unsettling, about this child's overeager smile. But he is a helpful sort. Perhaps he could made into a useful sort. [You might be able to recruit this acquaintance as a follower.]

elements.label: Howe, a believer
elements.description: Howe has proven to be receptive, but no less eerie. We feel he may know more than he lets on.

elements.label: Howe, a disciple
elements.description: Howe often brings back little gifts, he will never say where he found them. 'You make things a lot easer for me, so I figured I would return the favor.' He also does not say what he means by that.

elements.label: Howe, a Skintwister
elements.description: Howe takes many things rather literally; metaphors, names and his title among the most prominent. 'Never here though, she's not looking when I do it here.' At this point we know better than to ask him to elaborate.

elements.label: Howe, a Troublemaker
elements.description: Howe has been very bored as of late.

elements.label: Howe, a Rival
elements.description: 'The best part about being a kid is that no one blames you for the Percussigant charging through the main streets.'

elements.label: Howe, a Long in the Making
elements.description: Calling what Howe does to people 'Mercy' is not entirely wrong.

elements.label: Howe, a Prisoner
elements.description: We never expected such a small child to have such a loud voice. 'Please! You can't leave me in here! SHE'S COMING!' We hear him scream.
